trans-unit.target: TEXT_JOBREL300QUESTLEAVE_00350_ARDASHIR_000_000<tab>Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I was not expecting you to return so soon. Is...is something wrong?
TEXT_JOBREL300QUESTLEAVE_00350_Q1_000_000<tab>Tell him you wish to abandon your work on the anima?
TEXT_JOBREL300QUESTLEAVE_00350_ARDASHIR_000_010<tab>Of course, how silly of me! Though, for a moment, I was all but certain you wished to...to...
TEXT_JOBREL300QUESTLEAVE_00350_ARDASHIR_000_011<tab>Ahem. But should the time come that you decide you can no longer continue, I would understand.

TEXT_JOBREL300QUESTLEAVE_00350_ARDASHIR_000_020<tab>If it is rest you require, then it is rest you shall have. I should not have you overexert yourself for my sake. If and when you are willing to resume our research, I shall be here, ready and waiting.
TEXT_JOBREL300QUESTLEAVE_00350_ARDASHIR_000_030<tab>Very well, then I shall contact Ulan and Arnott at once. If you want for respite, then our work will have to wait.
TEXT_JOBREL300QUESTLEAVE_00350_ARDASHIR_000_031<tab>If and when you are willing to resume our research, I shall be here, ready and waiting.
TEXT_JOBREL300QUESTLEAVE_00350_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>Should you choose to abandon the quest “A Dream Fulfilled,” the attributes of your anima weapon will be reset to their original values.
TEXT_JOBREL300QUESTLEAVE_00350_SYSTEM_000_002<tab>Moreover, your progress will not be restored in the event you decide to undertake this quest again with the same job.
TEXT_JOBREL300QUESTLEAVE_00350_SYSTEM_000_003<tab>Furthermore, any crystal sand or umbrite used during the course of this quest will be permanently lost.
TEXT_JOBREL300QUESTLEAVE_00350_SYSTEM_000_004<tab>Please be advised that this process cannot be reversed.
TEXT_JOBREL300QUESTLEAVE_00350_Q1_000_010<tab>Are you certain you wish to abandon the quest “A Dream Fulfilled” and reset your progress?
TEXT_JOBREL300QUESTLEAVE_00350_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>You may speak with Ardashir at any time should you decide to abandon this quest in the future.
TEXT_JOBREL300QUESTLEAVE_00350_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>You may speak with Ardashir at any time should you decide to undertake this quest in the future.
